arn.description: The ARN of the endpoint that was created.

description.description: A description of the global endpoint.

endpointUrl.description: The URL of the endpoint that was created.

eventBuses.description: The event buses to use. The names of the event buses must be identical in each Region. Exactly two event buses are required. Documented below.

name.description: The name of the global endpoint.

replicationConfig.description: Parameters used for replication. Documented below.

roleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role used for replication between event buses.

routingConfig.description: Parameters used for routing, including the health check and secondary Region. Documented below.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering EventEndpoint resources.
